# Code Review Implementation Plan 

## Purpose

This plan addresses ALL actionable feedback from Pull Request review comments, providing a systematic approach to resolve every identified issue.

[] <Path of file 1>

- [ ] Lines: <comment start>:<comment end>

    - <reviewer name>: <follow-up comment if any>
    - <other participants>: <additional conversation exchanges>
  - Status: [Resolved | Unresolved]

- [ ] Lines: <comment start>:<comment end>

    - <author name>: <author response if any>
